mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.goods_id, t.num, t.status, t.add_time, t.update_time
mapper.delete: delete from goods_shopcar where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_shopcar ( user_id, goods_id, num, status, add_time, update_time ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update goods_shopcar set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
